item.title: 2D Animation Explainer Video Creator for Cybersecurity Product - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented and experienced 2D animator to create an engaging explainer video for our cybersecurity product, KernelCare. The video will be approximately 250 seconds long and needs to perfectly sync with our pre-recorded voiceover, which explains the live security patching technology for Linux kernels and showcases its benefits.

Responsibilities:
* Create a dynamic and visually compelling 2D animation that aligns with the provided script and voiceover.
* Design and animate various elements, including digital landscapes, servers, code, digital locks breaking, operating systems, operating system kernels, and other symbolic imagery as described in the script.
* Implement a clear, engaging, and dynamic visual narrative that effectively communicates the need for live patching for Linux kernels and the leading-edge live patching approach delivered by KernelCare.
* Work closely with our team to ensure the animation meets our brand standards and messaging goals.
* Deliver the final video in the required format and resolution, ensuring it is optimized for web and social media platforms.

Requirements:
* Proven experience in creating high-quality 2D explainer videos in the tech or cybersecurity industry.
* Strong portfolio showcasing your ability to animate complex concepts and create engaging narratives.
* Proficiency in animation software such as Adobe After Effects, Toon Boom, or similar.
* Excellent communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively with our team.
* Ability to adhere to tight deadlines and provide revisions based on feedback.
* **If you have them, please share similar work examples to our sector. Check our website: www.tuxcare.com


Project Details:
* Length of Video: Approximately 250 seconds
* Voiceover: Provided: Soon available
* Script: Provided: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1bAuIflVw4ziUgQjTb7-_0DJRSxWL8upy/edit
* Style: Engaging, informative, and professional. The animation should convey the seriousness of cybersecurity while also being accessible to a non-technical audience.
* Deadline: ASAP

Examples we like:
* https://www.redhat.com/en/about/videos/red-hat-insights-overview
* https://www.crowdstrike.com/resources/videos/cloud-security-with-crowdstrike/

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 25, 2024 14:12 UTC
Category: 2D Animation
Skills:Animated Explainer, 2D Animation, Motion Graphics, Explainer Video, Video Production, Video Editing, Graphic Design
Skills: Animated Explainer, 2D Animation, Motion Graphics, Explainer Video, Video Production, Video Editing, Graphic Design
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Best Highly Experienced Tiktok Creative Video editor (for advertising) wanted! - Upwork
item.description:
Hi,

We are currently looking for the best TikTok video editor possible for our ads. Extra important is that you are a king of marketing.  We have already had more than 5 editors, but unfortunately have not yet found the expert we need. If you have the following qualities, then this job could be for you:

- More than 2 Years of experience editing TikTok videos for ads.
- You must understand 100% why a Creative works on TikTok and why not.
- We want to learn from your experience, we need to be amazed by your Talent for marketing and Video editing.
- Be able to work quickly, and always be available.
- Come up with your own initiatives, and explore for new winning creatives.
- Have an obsession with Creatives, marketing and Video editing.

The job involves the following:

- You will be responsible of constantly supplying new creatives, the creatives can just be found on the internet, you will then have to shuffle them with the right techniques to get maximum achievable CTR and buying power on the videos.
- It's about Pheromone perfume, you can find thousands of videos of this on tiktok and other channels.


We are open to longer term collaborations.




Hourly Range: $15.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 14:07 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Animation video in AE/Animate - Upwork
item.description:
I am searching for an animator with expertise in After Effects and Animate (or similar) to bring to life a concept: a 10-15 second black/white line art animation involving two shapes. All the stills and storyboards are ready. Good, reliable communication is important, as well as an attention to detail and creative mind.

For more information about the project:
(2) a circle (simple 2px black stroke) bounces in effortlessly from the left of the screen, a square "pushes" in slowly from the right of the screen. anticipation and organic feel to the shapes is important. they meet in the middle and the square tries to fit into the circle. there is wiggling and tension and struggle, eventually the shapes merge together.

Budget: $110
Posted On: June 25, 2024 14:04 UTC
Category: 2D Animation
Skills:Adobe Animate, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Video Editing, Animation, 2D Animation, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Adobe Animate, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Video Editing, Animation, 2D Animation, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: EDM Memes and Reels Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented individual to find viral and trending EDM memes and reels and recreate them to match our brand using Canva and Capcut. The ideal candidate will have a passion for and deep understanding of electronic dance music culture, as well as a keen eye for design and social media trends. This role will involve curating and editing existing content to create engaging and shareable posts for our social media platforms. The successful candidate will have excellent attention to detail, a strong sense of creativity, and the ability to work within brand guidelines. If you have a strong track record in creating compelling EDM-related content and are excited about joining our team, we want to hear from you.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$25.00

item.title: Video Editor for YouTube Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented Long Form/Youtube Video Editor to join our team and assist in editing engaging content for our client, a Muslim entrepreneur. The ideal candidate will have experience in creating explainer-style videos. These videos will be inspired by the styles of Iman Gadzhi, respectively, tailored to our client's brand and vision.

Responsibilities:
1. Work closely with our team to understand project requirements and direction for each video.

2. Edit explainer-style videos featuring our client breaking down Muslim business secrets. This will include adding captions, animations, and other engaging elements to enhance viewer retention.

3. Ensure the videos maintain a consistent brand aesthetic and quality throughout.

4. Collaborate with the team to incorporate feedback and make necessary revisions.

5. Deliver final edited videos within the designated timeline of 7 days per video, with first and second drafts submitted in between.

Requirements:
1. Proven experience as a Video Editor with a strong portfolio showcasing your editing skills and creativity.

2. Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar tools.

3. Ability to execute different editing styles, from informative and educational to engaging and cinematic.

4. Strong understanding of storytelling techniques and pacing to keep viewers engaged.

5. Experience in adding captions, animations, and other visual elements to enhance video content.

6. Excellent communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with team members.

7. Familiarity with the styles of Iman Gadzhi is preferred but not required.

Additional Requirements:
1. Ability to edit two different types of videos each week, with a turnaround time of 7 days for the final version.

2. First draft to be delivered within 3 days of receiving the raw files, with a second draft returned within 7 days.

If you are passionate about creating engaging and high-quality long-form content for Muslim entrepreneurial audiences, we want to hear from you! Please submit your portfolio and any relevant examples.

Please find an example of a explainer-style videos that we recently produced. Please find an example below:

https://youtu.be/2DiCjo0QYwU?si=GiB3BxJFb7TsbhRV


Hourly Range: $10.00-$35.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 13:59 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Explainer Video, Vlog
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Explainer Video, Vlog
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Videographer for a Mindfulness e-learning course based in Los Angles, California, US - Upwork
item.description:
Awareness in Mind is a comprehensive program catered to middle and high school students that introduces the concepts of Mindfulness and Compassionate Communication to middle and high-school students, fostering their emotional well-being and interpersonal skills.

The Awareness in Mind (AIM) is an initiative by a Florida based 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization called Our Aim Foundation. (https://ouraim.org/awareness-in-mind/). The purpose of the program is to assist students in enhancing their mental health and overall well-being by implementing Social-Emotional Learning interventions that tackle prevalent mental health issues, including depression and anxiety.

The team is looking for a professional videographer to lead the project entailing recording and production of video materials for the AIM's e-learning platform. The videos will be uploaded to a customized Learning Management System (LMS).

Must be willing to travel to Santa Clarita.




Posted On: June 25, 2024 13:58 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Videography, Video Editing, Voice-Over, Elearning, Video Post-Editing, Audio Editing
Skills: Video Production, Videography, Video Editing, Voice-Over, Elearning, Video Post-Editing, Audio Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Looking for Social Media / Digital Marketing - Upwork
item.description:
We need a Social Media Manager for the following tasks:

- Create a Social Media Calendar together with Flo (once a month)
-     Transcribe post content sent from Flo
-     Coordinate with Video editor and other team members to have the content of time ready
- Create posts proactively from existing content
- Post 5 times a week on Linkedin
-     Post 5 times a week on Instagram and Facebook
Post 5plus times per week on TikTok and YouTube
-     Post ad hoc stories on Instagram and TikTok
-     Leave comments on other accounts for more engagement

In the near future:
-     Propose topics and formats for posts
-     Update website
- Run ads and other campaigns

I am looking for a person which is capable to handle the entire SOW and is interested in extending our collaboration over the next year.

Payment is 700USD per month
Looking for a freelancer fulltime to support the team

Please show your references and explain your methodology and knowledge on social media, your sales and marketing experience as well as your writing skills.

Check out my website: flo-akinbiyi.com to see what I am doing and if you would like to work with me!

Budget: $300
Posted On: June 25, 2024 13:51 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Content Creation, Influencer Marketing, Social Media Marketing Strategy, Education, Blog Writing, Twitter/X Marketing, Facebook
Skills: Social Media Content Creation, Influencer Marketing, Social Media Marketing Strategy, Education, Blog Writing, Twitter/X Marketing, Facebook
Country: United Arab Emirates

item.title: Video Shorts Editor - History Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to create slick, engaging video shorts for our history-focused channel. Here is an example short: https://www.youtube.com/shorts/4A0QfKoB6D0

We will send you:
- Video of the narrator shot on green screen
- the script
- and sometimes some visual notes

You will review the script, source stock video and photos to bring it to life in B-roll, and also use AI tool to create unique visuals to help tell the story. You will also generate titles in the style shown in the example above.

You must have:
- A love for history!
- Strong knowledge of where to source fair-use videos and images.
- Subscriptions to stock video sites
- Subscriptions to and experience using AI tools to generate images and/or videos
- Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines
- Excellent communication skills
- Portfolio of previous video editing work
- Knowledge of copyright regulations and licensing

Hourly Range: $11.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 13:41 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Country: United States
click to apply

item.description:
Hi,

I am looking for an expert to edit a very small video that is about 4 minutes long. I am looking to add video/photos over portions of the video in which I am speaking and possibly background music.  Please reach out if this is an area that you have expertise in, the job is pretty small and I am looking for a quick turnaround.

item.title: Video Editor | LONG TERM | Old Entertainment - History | Youtube Agency - Upwork
item.description:
Video Editor | LONG TERM | Old Entertainment - History | Youtube Agency
Take a look at this video, note the editing details throughout.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xT_CLU0DlMY

Are you able to edit a video like this?

The goal is to edit 4 weekly videos of 30 minutes each, at least.
The price per edited minute is $1. Weekly Total 120$. Monthly equals 480$.
The editing of each video must be ready in 2 days.

We´re looking for someone with the following requirements

1º Fast response times
2º Good understanding of storytelling and youtube retention.
3º No use of stock content.

***[IMPORTANT] Your offer WON'T be read if you do not attach previous video editing work.

If you feel confident to do this style of editing, send me a message to start today.

item.title: TikTok Whiz! Video Editor Needed - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for a talented and passionate video editor to join our growing team at Our Tech company  If you stay ahead of the curve on TikTok trends, can craft compelling stories in under a minute, and have a portfolio that makes us laugh, cry, or say "wow," then we want to hear from you!

What You'll Do:

Edit and create high-quality, engaging TikTok videos that capture attention and drive results.
Collaborate with our marketing team to understand brand messaging and target audience.
Stay up-to-date on the latest TikTok trends, challenges, and sound effects.
Work efficiently to meet deadlines and produce a consistent flow of content.
(Optional) Assist with brainstorming video concepts and storylines.

Who You Are:

A video editing rockstar with 1+ years of experience (portfolio required!).
Proficient in video editing software like Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro.
A social media guru with a deep understanding of the TikTok landscape.
A creative problem-solver who can think outside the box.
A team player with excellent communication and time management skills.
A bonus if you have experience with motion graphics or creating viral content.

What We Offer:

The chance to work on a dynamic team and create content that makes a difference.
Competitive salary and benefits package.
A fun and collaborative work environment.
The opportunity to grow your skills and become a TikTok guru.

Ready to join the party?

We can't wait to see your work!


Budget: $1,500
Posted On: June 25, 2024 13:16 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Videography, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Commercial
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Videography, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Commercial
Country: United Arab Emirates
click to apply
